definition: to press down/to press a button
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
solve one problem only to find another cropping up
pinyin: an4 xia4 hu2 lu2 fu2 qi3 piao2

sentences.english: Press the horn appeared in a hoarse voice of sand.
sentences.chinese: 按下喇叭出現沙啞聲音沙。

sentences.english: With the mouse button held down, you can use the mouse-wheel to change your movement speed.
sentences.chinese: 按下鼠標右鍵同時使用鼠標滾輪可以改變移動速度。

sentences.english: Press the Make-up button for instant skin texture enhancement.
sentences.chinese: 按下美顏按鈕可立即查看到膚質改善的效果。

sentences.english: Once upon a time, someone pressed the jump button.
sentences.chinese: 很久很久以前，有人按下了跳躍鍵。

sentences.english: Press the amount you have to pay, insert your coins, and the ticket will come out.
sentences.chinese: 按下妳要買的票價，投入零錢，票就會跑出來了。

sentences.english: Press this button to start copying.
sentences.chinese: 按下此鍵可開始複印工作。

sentences.english: Press to get to the router prompt.
sentences.chinese: 按下回車鍵進入路由器提示符狀態。

sentences.english: We found the elevator and pressed Level 7.
sentences.chinese: 我們找到電梯，按下七樓。

sentences.english: Leave for 1 hour before pressing the button to re-activater the unit.
sentences.chinese: 自動關閉後，建議隔一個小時後再重新按下啓動按鈕。

sentences.english: Press discharge valve until the pressure meter indicates zero.
sentences.chinese: 按下排氣閥，直到壓力錶指示爲零即可。

sentences.english: Click on the correct colored object.
There is no door closing button. Press any floor button to close the landing door.
sentences.chinese: 這裏沒有關門按掣，按下任何樓層按鈕以關閉機門。

sentences.english: Send the frames further back in time the longer the mouse button is pressed.
sentences.chinese: 鼠標按下時間越長，幀回退得越遠。

sentences.english: The pressed key is optionally displayed in the console window.
sentences.chinese: 按下的按鍵會顯示在主控臺視窗中。

sentences.english: My suggestion to you is to just push the button now and sort it out during stasis.
sentences.chinese: 我提議你，現在按下按鍵，在障礙時期做打疊整頓。

sentences.english: Then the guide flung sand into the air, and I clicked the shutter.
sentences.chinese: 然後導遊剷起沙子揚到空氣中，我快速按下快門。

definition: key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin
button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
power switch/gas valve/to open the city (or frontier) gate/to open and close/to switch on and off
to release/to let go/to loosen/to untie/to come loose
to stir/to prod/to poke/to move sideways/to strum (on a guitar etc)
